Content: 11 Division troops under command to the Security Force Headquarters - Central (SFHQ-Cen) conducted a ‘Shramadana’ programme at Gangarama Viharaya, Lewella in Kandy on Saturday (28) with the participation of 27 troops, including 2 Officers. This event was conducted in response to a request, made by the Chief Incumbent in the temple from the Commander, Security Forces - Central, Major General Rukamal Dias.
